name: JF Simple Coming Soon
author: Jerome Fitzpatrick

sections.description: Use JF Simple Coming Soon to easily create a coming soon page for visitors who are not logged in. Specify the background and text colour and use the standard WordPress editor to insert images and text into your coming soon page and override the default CSS if desired.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit Settings => Simple Coming Soon to configure the options and enable by selecting the Enable This Plugin checkbox
sections.faq:
How do I reset to the default values?

Delete the value of the option field and save. It will then be reset to its default value.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version

1.0.1

  • Applied “the_content” filter before echoing content of splash page
